Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails, and prepare for the test plan review meeting.
Meeting with @LDes-1 and @LPro-1 to review the test plan. Discuss their feedback and make necessary adjustments to the document. Emphasize the importance of comprehensive testing.
Incorporate feedback from the meeting into the test plan. Refine test cases and clarify any ambiguities.
Begin executing test cases from the core mechanics section of the test plan. Meticulously document all findings, including steps to reproduce, expected vs. actual results, and severity level.
Log any bugs or issues found during testing in the bug tracking system. Assign severity levels based on impact to gameplay.
Continue executing test cases and documenting findings. Focus on identifying and reporting any critical issues that could block development progress.
End of day. Leave the office.
